--- (1a) If ProcessingFeesUsd__c is blank or zero, convert ProcessingFees__c to USD using ConversionRate__c and add service fees and adjustment fees.

global Decimal Revenue__c

Calculates the revenue by subtracting processing fees and agents commissions from the total fees and adding or subtracting any (revenue) adjustments

Field Attributes

Data Type:Currency(16,2)
Formula:ABS(TotalFees__c) - ABS(ProcessingFees__c) - ABS(AgentsCommissions__c) + BLANKVALUE(AdjustmentsProcessingFees__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(RevenueAdjustments__c, 0)
Required:false
External ID:false

global Decimal RevenueUsd__c

Formula field for the revenue calculated in USD

Field Attributes

Data Type:Currency(16,2)
Formula:ABS(TotalFeesUsd__c) - IF( BLANKVALUE(ProcessingFeesUsd__c, 0) = 0, ROUND(ABS(ProcessingFees__c) / BLANKVALUE(ConversionRate__c, 1), 2), ABS(ProcessingFeesUsd__c) ) - ABS(AgentsCommissionsUsd__c) + BLANKVALUE(AdjustmentsProcessingFees__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(RevenueAdjustmentsUsd__c, 0)
Required:false
External ID:false

Formula:BLANKVALUE(OrdersAmountCollectedUsd__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(OrdersAdjustmentsSubtotalUsd__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(OrdersAdjustmentsTipsUsd__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(OrdersAdjustmentsTaxUsd__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(OrdersAdjustmentsOtherUsd__c, 0)
Required:false
External ID:false


global Decimal TotalFees__c

The formula sums the processing fees and the services fees plus adjustments if any. For old bills, it shows the value of the deprecated field "Fees".

Field Attributes

Data Type:Currency(16,2)
Formula:IF((BLANKVALUE(Fees__c, 0) = 0), BLANKVALUE(ProcessingFees__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(ServiceFees__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(AdjustmentsProcessingFees__c, 0), BLANKVALUE(Fees__c, 0))
Required:false
External ID:false


global Decimal TotalFeesUsd__c

The formula calculates a value based on the following logic:

(1) For bills where the deprecated field Fees__c is blank or zero:

--- (1a) If ProcessingFeesUsd__c is blank or zero, convert ProcessingFees__c to USD using ConversionRate__c and add service fees and adjustment fees. --- (1b) If ProcessingFeesUsd__c is not blank or zero, use its value and add service fees and adjustment fees.

(2) For older bills where the deprecated field Fees__c is not blank or zero, convert Fees__c to USD using ConversionRate__c.

Field Attributes

Data Type:Currency(16,2)
